Glendale.Security Trust and Savings: Security Trust and Savings, also known as Security Pacific Bank, is a highrise office building in Hollywood, California and built in 1921. The building was designed by the father and son design team of John and Donald Parkinson, who also designed some of the city's major landmarks, including Los Angeles City Hall and Bullocks Wilshire. In 1983, the Security Trust and Savings building was listed on the National Register of Historic Places.
